==== emitArrowFunctionThisCapturingES6.ts (0 errors) ====
    var f1 = () => {
        this.age = 10
    };
    
    var f2 = (x: string) => {
        this.name = x
    }
    
    function foo(func: () => boolean){ }
    foo(() => {
        this.age = 100;
        return true;
    });
